ChestSMInclineShoulderRaise.name: Smith Incline Shoulder Raise
ChestSMInclineShoulderRaise.preparation: Lie supine on incline bench with shoulders under bar. Grasp bar with shoulder width overhand grip. Extend elbows. Disengage bar by rotating bar back.
ChestSMInclineShoulderRaise.execution: Raise shoulders toward bar as high as possible. Lower shoulders to bench and repeat.
ChestSMInclineShoulderRaise.comments: Keep arms straight throughout execution. For convenience, exercise can be performed immediately after warm up on Smith Incline Chest Press.
